Quarter: The fiscal quarter for which the IT infrastructure costs were calculated, e.g., Q2 2024.
Average_Cost_Per_Employee: The average cost of IT infrastructure per employee in the specified quarter.
Total_IT_Spend: The total amount spent on IT infrastructure for the specified quarter.
Employee_Count: The total number of employees considered in the calculation for the specified quarter.
Revenue_Impact_Percentage: The percentage of the total IT spend out of the company's annual revenue, providing context on financial impact.
